Articles.Content:
This thread is hoping to be the go-to for all things fireworks related.  I really enjoyed participating in @cubinator's Firework Propulsion Challenge, well deserving of Thread of the Month and something I highly encourage you to check out.  And entering a firework-powered plane, I started thinking about weirder stuff.  I'm not alone.  If you have seen @Matt Lowne's 1.12 Video,  you would have seen a firework Gatling gun.  

So with that in mind, welcome to the Firework Abuse Thread (FAT), Abusing Fireworks Thread (AFT), Kerbals Really Abusing Fireworks Tendentiously (K.R.A.F.T.), Fireworks Readily Abused by Cerebral Kerbals (F.R.A.C.K.)  or whatever you prefer to call it.   Please post photos, video, and/or craft files of your attempts to push Kerbal design parameters beyond what is advisable.

I confess, I have selfish motivations. I want a one-stop home for my projects as well. So I will kick this off with my current project, a low-gravity batting practice setup.   It is still a work in progress, but the basic idea is sound:
